termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.introduction: By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with the terms described below.

section1.title: Website Access
section1.content: Access to this website is provided for personal and informational purposes only.

section2.title: User Responsibilities
section2.content: You agree not to misuse the website or attempt to disrupt its functionality.

section3.title: Content Accuracy
section3.content: While we strive to keep information accurate, we do not guarantee completeness or timeliness.

section4.title: Availability
section4.content: The website may be unavailable temporarily due to maintenance or technical issues.

section5.title: Modifications
section5.content: These Terms of Use may be modified at any time without prior notice.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: By accessing this website, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions described below.

section1.title: Use of the Website
section1.content: You agree to use this website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of others.

section2.title: Intellectual Property
section2.content: All content on this website is the intellectual property of the author unless otherwise stated.

section3.title: Limitation of Liability
section3.content: The author shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use this website.

section4.title: External Links
section4.content: This website may contain links to external sites. The author is not responsible for their content.

section5.title: Changes to Terms
section5.content: These terms may be updated at any time without prior notice.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how information is collected, used, and protected when you access this website.

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.content: We may collect personal information such as name, email address, and usage data when you interact with the website.

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.content: The collected information is used to improve user experience, respond to inquiries, and enhance website functionality.

section3.title: Data Sharing
section3.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent users’ personal identification information to others.

section4.title: Data Security
section4.content: We adopt appropriate data collection, storage, and processing practices to protect your personal information.

section5.title: Changes to This Policy
section5.content: This Privacy Policy may be updated at any time. Changes will be reflected on this page.
